thread.title: Gigi Hadid flashes white bra on Max Mara catwalk for MFW | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Gigi Hadid flashes white bra on Max Mara catwalk for MFW | Daily Mail Online

author: Ellie Genower For Mailonline
title: Gigi Hadid flashes white bra on Max Mara catwalk for MFW | Daily Mail Online
text: Primped and preened: Gigi was pictured backstage getting her hair teased and sprayed Now your turn: Gigi seemed to be in high spirits before the show Model siblings: Gigi and Bella don't appear to have any rivalry with Bella saying her older sibling 'lets me do my thing' Lady in red: Lily Donaldson was one of the models who took to the catwalk The show was attended by a menagerie of stunning fashionistas including Ashley Graham who sported a plunging white dress which showed off copious amounts of cleavage. The brunette's models'a hair was worn slicked back and loose while strappy sandals and a white jacket completed the look. She arrived on the arm of her husband Justin Ervin who sported a grey suit and black shirt. Dazzling: Lily stepped out on to the runway in the show's muted colours Plunging look: Ashley Graham was among the attendees, arriving in a low cut white dress White stuff: The brunette's models'a hair was worn slicked back and loose while strappy sandals and a white jacket completed the look In the frow: Ashley was joined by husband Justin Ervin in prime position Sharing her thoughts: Ashley caught up with a few people at the event Olivia Palermo cut a more colourful figure in a bright yellow coat and black scarf as she arrived at the event. The fashionista and U.S. reality star teamed the overcoat with a pair of patterned trousers and blue velvet slip-on shoes while a black furry scarf added a touch of contrast. Elsa Hosk was much more casual in her denim jacket with woolly trim, jeans and a grey sweater. Harlequin-style suede ankle boots and glitzy sunglasses gave her a more quirky appearance. Mellow yellow: Olivia Palermo cut a more colourful figure in a bright yellow coat and black scarf as she arrived at the event Feeling blue: Olivia teamed her outfit with patterned trousers and slip-on velvet shoes Low key: Elsa Hosk was much more casual in her denim jacket with woolly trim, jeans and a grey sweater. Here for the fashion: Caroline Vreeland sported a pair of ripped leggings and black and white ankle boots with her blue cardigan Slim and trim: Actress Zoey Deutch showed off her svelte frame in red trousers and a beige coat Gigi has long been associated with the Italian brand, having become the face of its spring/summer 2017 accessories campaign and also opened its spring/summer 2017 runway show. Her appearance came a day after she modelled for Alberta Ferretti in the Italian fashion capital, before she and her model sister Bella grabbed a bit to eat. The supermodel sisters arrived in Milan on Monday for the Italian city's Fashion Week. Model line up: Gigi posed alongside a group of models in red including Natasha Poly, Lily Donaldson and Hana Jirickova Mirror mirror on the wall: Gigi was snapped getting primped and preened Spray today: Gigi's dark blonde tresses were won in a side parting and tousled over one shoulder The duo have seen their careers go from strength to strength in recent weeks - having jetted over to Italy from a number of high-profile appearances, such as Versus Versace and Anna Sui, in both London and New York. The sisters don't appear to have any degree of sibling rivalry with Bella recently telling Australia's E!show The Hype: '[Gigi] gives me advice sometimes but mostly she lets me do my thing and be myself. 'It's nice to have a separation between us.' Check mate: Gigi left the show sporting a red and black shirt trousers and lace up boots Back to black: Gigi looked sombre as she was escorted by a group of assistants into the show
